website_summaries.verdict: Whether you aren't sure what to stuff in a stocking or you know your loved one likes to pick out his or her own gifts, an Amazon gift card is a practical option.
pros: Gives the recipient the opportunity to get something really wanted or needed
Countless options to choose from on Amazon
Custom amounts to meet your budget
cons: Some may feel that a gift card isn't as personal as other gifts, but if you feel this way, you could combine it with other stocking stuffers for an added personal touch

customer_reviews.title: DONT USE THE TEXT MESSAGE OPTION!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of the eGift cards, but when you choose the option of delivery through a text message, the recipient may not get it. Also, there is no way to cancel the order through your account portal...you have to contact someone at Amazon customer service who will then send you an email with a link that you have to go to. I would not recommend an eGift card through a text message to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lukoskis

customer_reviews.title: I have tried to send a gift card by email ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to send a gift card by email 3 times. I keep getting the message "must include an @ or other symboll"....and I did! I give up.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: eGift Card System IS BROKEN!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY Amazon eGift cards! Their system is broken and they are not even aware of it. If you purchase gift card and send to another person, that gift card will be redeemed before they receive it. The eGift card information is sent in the clear AND activated. Which means anything on the internet can intercept the information an cash the card in at 3rd party site for cash or redeem the card at Amazon with a bogus account. They don't even care let alone how many pissed off customers they have or how many millions are being list..who cares right? And it's such an easy fix. Until fixed Don't buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Customizable Last-Minute Gift
customer_reviews.text: When I needed a last minute party favor for a cat-themed charity party, Amazon helped me create a custom solution in only 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Never Again
customer_reviews.text: Ordered gift card for Fathers Day for Son-in-law. When he tried to use it, it had already been redeemed. Further investigation showed that by the day after I ordered it and it was sent to my email, it was redeemed (not by me). Amazon has sent this to their fraud department but I was told that because whoever redeemed it, used it right away and there is nothing they can do to compensate me for the loss. Also, they know who redeemed it but cannot share that info. Thanks for nothing. I will never order another gift card.
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in gift card service
customer_reviews.text: There's no reason why I should keep getting error messages when I try and send gift cards. (Third time. After calls, emails, earlier one sent. I'm not going thru it again.) Will go somewhere else for my company gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Creamer

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: I received an offer for a free $15 gift card if at least $50 in gift cards were purchased, so I did it and never got my free $15 promotional card. I asked amazon about it and they said there was no such offer. It gave me a button to click and when I clicked it, it said that the offer was accepted...
customer_reviews.author: Dan Lampkin

customer_reviews.title: A simple response from Amazon security would help.
customer_reviews.text: Beware! My gift card to my nephew on his birthday was apparently stolen by a hacker. I have emailed Amazon and have gotten no response, although the card was instantly redeemed. Shouldn't Amazon have a record of who used it? NO CUSTOMER SERVICE ON GIFT CARDS!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Riley

customer_reviews.title: E-Gift cards - Not really
customer_reviews.text: I should have heeded the negative reviews I read since this gift card was not delivered on my son's birthday as scheduled and it's now going to take them two days to determine what went wrong. Beyond disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Bree Gurin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great and convenient way to gift a great present to my amazonholic shopping friend! If you don't know what to get your friend gift them one of these amazing Amazon eGift Cards! They're not like traditional gift-cards that you could possibly lose, forget about, or expire.
customer_reviews.author: jmn27

customer_reviews.title: Get the emails right because you may not be able to see a return refund
customer_reviews.text: I had difficulty with one of the email addresses and contacted support advising them that it was incorrectly inputted. I purchased another and delivered this successfully however I did not receive the refund of the unallocated gift card. This was unsettling to say the least
customer_reviews.author: IV

customer_reviews.title: What a waste. Amazon is proving to be a burden
customer_reviews.text: Why can't I use my Amazon balance to purchase an Amazon gift card for my son? You require me to purchase additional credit with a credit card when I can cover this with my balance? What a waste. Amazon is proving to be a burden.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Amazon egift Card
customer_reviews.text: It's an egift card. I bought it. I sent it. It was received. It was spent. What more is there to write. The recipient was happy to have money to spend. The process is easy, it was delivered as requested.
customer_reviews.author: P. Woodland

customer_reviews.title: took awhile at the end it seemed that it was going to fine and that a new gift card would be issued
customer_reviews.text: Sent this gift card electronically for the birth of my nephew, I liven Canada the receiver in the United States. The receiver wasn't able to redeem the gift card as someone neither of us knew redeemed it before she had a chance. Chatted with customer service through online chat, took awhile at the end it seemed that it was going to fine and that a new gift card would be issued, it never happened. Still waiting, ordered a new one and sent it so receiver wouldn't have to wait. Won't be ordering one again.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Making a friend happier
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a long time friend who lives in California and I live in Canada, what a better thing to give a friend where she can get something she likes and meets her needs than me playing where is the pea under what nut shell and picking something she just tolerate but not suits her. A GIFT CARD everytime works for those who have everything and it makes my Christmas shopping a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: GolfGwen

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to use with immediate delivery!
customer_reviews.text: We liked the ease of using these gift cards. We have family that live quite a long distance away and using these cards is an easy way to send them a gift that gets there quickly. They all use Amazon and they like the fact that they get to choose what they actually buy. The gift cards are fast and easy to use! We have used these cards multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: JJCEO

customer_reviews.title: loved the concept
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea...loved the concept. But when it came to sending it to the recipient the animation program didn't work with the Amazon site & the recipient never got it. Had to call 3 times, resending it through Amazon Assistants each time. Finally had to have Amazon send gift cards out manually so was not received by the birthday person until 2 1/2 weeks later!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Meier

customer_reviews.title: No safety  Barrier
customer_reviews.text: Amazon needs to add a cancel order option as I sent a gift card to my friend only to find out that his email has been hacked no way to get my money back now
customer_reviews.author: caleb grandbois

customer_reviews.title: What am I doing wrong?
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get a link to add to cart regardless of which one I try
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnne

customer_reviews.title: Not safe to send an ecard as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I sent an electronic gift card and it was redeemed by someone other than the recipient. This was confirmed by customer service but there was no recourse and I was out $50. Like others this was then forwarded to the fraud department and nothing never came of it. Amazon gift cards, particularly ecards are not safe to use. You cannot be sure they will be hacked. And you will always be put the money. Might as well throw the money out the window and hope the recipient catches it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariterri

customer_reviews.title: Best birthday gift ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a last minute gift for a lil cousin who's birthday had already passed and his mother told me that he didn't need anything so I asked what kind of things did he like and she mentioned that she frequently buys things on Amazon for him so we could get him an Amazon gift card and she'd use it for future purchases for him. I thought that was a very creative idea and think I'll add that to my list of gift ideas when people ask what to get my baby daughter who's the same age as her son when they ask what to get her for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Refine98

customer_reviews.title: I texted this gift card to my Granddaughter, works like a charm, they get the card instantly!
customer_reviews.text: I used the text option to send these last minute gift cards to my Granddaughters (via their mom's phone). Works really well, you get a confirmation email that it has been received, and a confirmation that the cards have been redeemed. Granddaughter's very happy with the card design. I love the options you have when you send Amazon gift cards!
customer_reviews.author: NPR MANTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Every kiss begins with Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Wooo nothing like an e-gift card! You’ll FEEL REDEEMED when you purchase this card! Nothing says love more than an Amazon gift card. Did your gf change the locks and isn’t responding? She didn’t really want to file that restraining order she just wants an Amazon card. Best way to send it? Through email because she probably has you blocked on text, right? Amazon is willing to deliver this beaut of a card to say Merry Christmas honey I’ve got the goods.
customer_reviews.author: She Revues

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully done artwork and comedic too!
customer_reviews.text: this is a fun to use and easy as well egift card solution to sending a quick egift card to a friend or love one and very likable cartoon like story as well.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Remember to sign out of Amazon on a shared computer!
customer_reviews.text: My wife's birthday morning was nerve-racking as the card required a 2-step verification code which took way too long to arrive. I think we re-requested the code 2 or 3 more times before the card opened on the desktop. The music and animation were perfect, but then the card automatically loaded itself into MY Amazon account, not hers! Not a terribly big deal, but awfully annoying anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Naz

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Easy Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a coworker who was on leave after surgery. Although some reviews I read said people had trouble sending the e-cards, it went straight to her and she loved it. The only complaint I have is that you are very limited with the number of words you can type in your message. I would give an e-card again. It was easy, fast, and she said receiving it made her day!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy Amazon Gift Cards
customer_reviews.text: I sent a gift card via email to my son. It showed as sent, and I was charged, but he never received it. Now I have to go to my bank and dispute this. I hear Amazon won't help you at all. This sounds like an inside job, and they are doing nothing to stop the problem. Don't buy a gift card online. Take your credit card off the site so it cannot be used without your consent. Let everyone know through Facebook, etc. that Amazon is not safe. Wish I could take away the last star. This is just so wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Dutchgrl50

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you don't get screwed over with these
customer_reviews.text: My account was compromised and two of these gift cards were purchased with my saved credit cards on my account for $150. Amazon will not help you at all, a billion dollar company can't help bring justice to a situation. Don't waste your time trying to get your money back after getting screwed over by these things. It won't get you anywhere. Right around the holidays too, I won't be shopping off Amazon anymore after this. They can shove it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Karpenko

customer_reviews.title: Best way to say I love you to family and friends living on another countries
customer_reviews.text: My extended family lives all over the world , same goes for dear friends. Therefore, it's difficult and at times expensive shipping them gifts. But now, with Amazon E-Gift cards it is easy, fast and convenient!!! Love it!!! And my family and friends agrees😁😊😀
customer_reviews.author: W.F.

customer_reviews.title: Fast, convenient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and quick! I’ve used these a few times for special events. Always for those out of state family members. This was the first time I’ve used Amazon and I was quite pleased. It arrived via email for the recipient within an hour or two. The recipient said the convenience to use was a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Anchoragebrat

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Amazon Gift Card for my Daughter so she could pick out exactly what she wanted for her birthday. I really liked how quick & easy the process was; you pick out the $ amount you want the gift card to be, then you chose whether you want the gift card to be delivered in the mail in a nice package, or immediately given to the recipient the same day in an email or text for FREE with a nice E-card for the occasion. I would definitely recommend this to anyone for any occasion. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Phil G & JoJo

customer_reviews.title: you allow scammers to get away with open theft.and you dont seem to care
customer_reviews.text: it was stolen immediately from customer you advertised on your site and you didn't take an iota of responsibility.this will definitely hurt your ratings,ive checked into it and found other customers fell into the same MISLEADING trap.but why should you care?im just 1 in a billion .right?
customer_reviews.author: CustomerZ

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I know I heard from others the scare of lost e gift cards secured by other people yet contacted that family member to confirm they received email as well as loaded it to their Amazon account to assure no complications.
customer_reviews.author: IVAN

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy gift
customer_reviews.text: When you don't know what someone wants, or you've waited until the 11th hour, these are awesome because delivery is quick and Amazon basically has everything. There are a couple of people I know who are rabidly anti-Amazon (anti any large company, really) and they don't appreciate these but everyone else loves the option of choosing what they really want. This was easy to order and was delivered to my recipient within 5 minutes. I got a notification when it was delivered, which gave me peace of mind. Great gift option!
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: One size fits all. The height of convenience for Amazonians
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for the 11th Hour Santa* or for those parents who have fallen completely out of touch with what their older kids are into. I fall into both categories so this is perfect for me and have used them many times. The Christmas one arrived in a very nice Christmas themed Altoids-like metal box suitable for subarbor placement or as a stocking stuffer. You can also just email the code for an instant gift that can be redeemed and used immediately. Highly recommended. (* the phrase '11th Hour Santa' appropriated from Playboy Magazine)
customer_reviews.author: Dean J Copely

customer_reviews.title: Unable to use it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift card for my daughter. For some reason, she was unable to use it. When I called to try to find out why, Amazon couldn't give me any information. When I tried to redeem it or get my money back, they were unable to do that as well. Be care purchasing Amazon gift cards.
customer_reviews.author: james somahkawahho

customer_reviews.title: Amazon's system is wrong and they will not correct it
customer_reviews.text: I tried to send mom a gift card by text, but their system does not send it, claiming that the cell number does not exist, even after calling them from that number. Especially to a WA state cell number, you would think that they could update their system. The funny thing is that they refused to manually call the number or refer anything to their technical department.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I’m blown away! This is simply the best gift card EVER. I don’t know who came up with this but they deserve our eternal praise and thanks (maybe even a statue in their own rights). I’m totally in love with this: From the most beautifully crafted website to the oh so personal email with the gift card notification, I could not wish for more.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Might be nice, I don't know
customer_reviews.text: I think it might have been fine, but I can't know for sure. I uploaded, loved the idea of it but didn't get to see what the end result was. I'm not even sure the recipient received it with photo... it didn't show. All I saw was the the blank "your photo" when it went. I just hoped it came out the way I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Cormier

customer_reviews.title: Recipient Never Received Card Via E-mail
customer_reviews.text: When you place your order you have several choices as to how you want to send it. I chose e-mail and entered the same address that I sent a similar gift card to, last year, for a birthday gift. This year, they didn't get it. I clicked Resend and sent to same address. Recipient didn't get it. I tried to find another way to send but since I chose e-mail in the beginning that was the only choice. I would like to send in a Text message but that is not an option on a resend request. I don't see a way to cancel the order and start over. Very irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I went onto the Amazon Australia website expecting to purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: I went onto the Amazon Australia website expecting to purchase AUD gift voucher but it came through as USD voucher. So now the person I bought the gift card for has to change her Australian account (in order to use for her Kindle) over to an American account in order to use it. How do I purchase AUD voucher in the future? It was very unclear and I certainly had no idea this was going to happen when I purchased it. I will not purchase a gift voucher for a Kindle online again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Maunsell

customer_reviews.title: Looks like I lost 100 bucks  e-gift text message does not work
customer_reviews.text: I sent $100 e-gift card via text message. Unfortunately the recipient could not redeem it. Every time she is clicking o the link, it's saying wrong code. Now there's no link to cancel this order. Looks like there's no way I can recover that $$$. PLEASE DO NOT USE THIS FEATURE, THERE IS SOFTWARE CODE DEFECTS IN ENCRYPTION LOGIC. THERE IS A HIGH PROBABILITY THAT YOU WILL LOSE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Yogabrata

customer_reviews.title: Happy Receiver
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to send this Amazon.com eGift Card to my sister-in-law! I like how I was able to customize the image/graphic, saying, and the amount given very easily. I also was able to pick exactly when the card would be sent to her. This is a great way to give someone whom can be difficult to purchase a world of choices to pick exactly what they'd like as they can add this amount and pay the rest if needed without limitations. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Elly

customer_reviews.title: NEVER store your credit card information on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Amazon needs to have more security for these. My account got hacked to the tune of $750 in gift cards. I thought I used a strong password too. Amazon refunded all but $50. I will NEVER store my credit card information on Amazon again. Kind of sucks but better safe than sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Chipster

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Awful!!! Three times and still no gift card. Come on Amazon, get it together!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Amazon gift card scare
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I read these reviews. I've sent several gift cards to my daughter's for their birthdays and always with a little hesitation fearing that something could happen. I use Amazon a lot but don't think I'll send gift cards any more since so many have had these problems , it's just my luck that one day this would happen to me.
customer_reviews.author: lilly walker

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed
customer_reviews.text: I received an eGift card code via email and went to apply it to my account and it said it was already used. Clearly it was not used on my account, and I wouldn't be making this review post if I had simply bought it to give to someone else. But, after going through customer service 4 times, it's clear my $100 is gone. I didn't get to use my gift card, and I did not receive a refund. I understand it's hard for them to track whether or not I really gave it to someone else or not, but still. I didn't. And I'm out $100.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Thornton

customer_reviews.title: A Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of an animated gift card right from the start, and this one did not disappoint. You can send via text or e-e-mail. This makes it very convenient for both parties. Not a whole lot to choose from, however, but as long as you're not sending to multiple people who either know each other or who are in the same family, you should be okay. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Amazon dropped a bomb on Mother’s Day
customer_reviews.text: Gift cards are always a welcome gift, but I bought two cards for Mother’s Day and Amazon screwed them up again and again, failing to deliver. As a result I had to spoil the surprise and call my intended recipients to ask that they look in their spam/deleted folder. The email addresses were correct, but Amazon couldn’t deliver ever. Finally, I had to have them sent to me and I forwarded them after Mother’s Day had come and gone. Usually Amazon is aces at what they do but they sure dropped the ball on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Luvs2shop

customer_reviews.title: Easy to buy, easy to redeem!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and received several gift Amazon e-gift cards in the last few days. Had zero issues with redeeming them. Just make sure you tell the reciever that they are getting a e-gift card so they can redeem them right away and and keep the balance in their Amazon account until they feel like using it so there won't be issues the way some have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Sanriobaby

customer_reviews.title: Gift Cards not accessible through Text Message
customer_reviews.text: I again ordered three gift cards this Christmas 2018. One sister was able to redeem and access. The second sister could not and many messages and phone calls with Amazon resulted, finally a three-way conversation with the Manila call-center resolved access. Then a few weeks later my brother called saying he could see the gift card but could not use it; however, I see it is marked "Redeemed" on my Amazaon wheich greatly reduces my options. This has not happened in previous years, but I see from others warnings that something has gone wrong with Amazon Gift Card giving.
customer_reviews.author: Richard N. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Auto delivered smiles
customer_reviews.text: This was so adorable. My hunny just had his birthday & not only did he get a few bonus bucks to peruse the tools on Amazon, he was greeted with singing & dancing peeps wishing him a happy birthday. I ordered this last month & it auto delivered on my requested date. I did day before. He's a Virgo. They are early for EVERYTHING. It's a great way to make sure you never forget an occasion.. birthday, anniversary, flag day & share a smile .
customer_reviews.author: J&J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use!  Makes a Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this "Welcome Baby!" Amazon gift card for a co-worker of mine. She was thrilled to receive it. These gift cards are easy to purchase, easy to redeem, and arrive within minutes (or on the exact date of your choosing). You can also customize the amount of the gift. Thank you Amazon for making gift-giving so simple!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: amulet

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: I had an out of town family member to whom I wanted to send a gift and I hate having to pay postage on top of the price of the gift. Also, I always worry that whatever I pick out they need to return because maybe they received multiples of the same item or it is not something they want, so in my opinion, a gift card is perfect. It went through perfectly. Everyone happy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S.K.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to redeem
customer_reviews.text: The eCard is a great idea and so convenient. The only problem was the person I gave it to had a lot of trouble trying to redeem it. I was embarrassed and I was frustrated for them. They were finally able to use it but it took several “tries” to get the help they needed and figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: RKR

customer_reviews.title: Gift cards fleeced by hackers
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife and before she could open the email the money had been spent by a thief - someone else also got the email and drained the card. Won't buy gift cards here again. Got no relief from Amazon when we tried to resolve.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Ratcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: After I purchased this Gift Card, it was almost immediately redeemed by someone I do not know, which I reported to Amazon as a fraud. Amazon told me that they can see who redeemed it, but still asked me to report it to Credit Card company. The bank did reimburse the amount, only to charge it again a couple months later. According to the bank Amazon reported it to them as a dispute and not a fraud. Since they did not hear back from Amazon, they renewed the charge. It seems Amazon did not address the issue at all, but just kicked it back to the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Manfred Moik

customer_reviews.title: Easy, if you don't need a confirmation that it got sent.
customer_reviews.text: The recipient received the gift card, but I only knew that because I asked. I didn't get an immediate notification from Amazon, which I found disappointing. I did get notified by Amazon a week or two later, but by that time, I already received a Thank You from the person I sent it to. When I purchased a gift card online from Starbucks, I got notified right away when the recipient received it. How hard can it be to use Starbucks model?
customer_reviews.author: Writing Rose

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy, and versatile gift idea.
customer_reviews.text: The eGift cards are the beat last minute gifts for stocking stuffers or occasion cards. They’re usually delivered in minutes which is super helpful when you’re in a rush. If you want to buy a weird amount there is a custom amount option which is super helpful when you’re “gifting” this to a friend or family member for something specific. You can buy a card large enough to cover any of their local sales tax or as little as a few bucks to clear off old visa gift cards or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Snafu with the card!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this e-card for my son-in-law. What a pain in the backside!!!! I have purchased many cards before without a bit of difficulty but, this time the nightmare was exponentially tiresome. Was never delivered and took over three phone calls to straighten out!
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: STOLEN not my order
customer_reviews.text: This item was not ordered by me. It was stolen from my account. I would like to see better security on these items, like having to confirm that it was ordered by the original email given on the account or text to the original number listed on the account before delivery of the item. It was too easy for someone to hack my account and order anything. Maybe stop storing credit cards on your site as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Parrish

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE, Amazon Electronic Gift Cards Too Easily Stolen!
customer_reviews.text: I bought an email gift card for my dad for father's day and it was stolen by a simple process by someone unknown to me or my family (Amazon was EASILY able to determine who the thief was). However, it took 4 days and many hours to get a $ credit back from Amazon. I will NOT buy a gift card from Amazon again; the theft was way too easy and can easily be duplicated by anyone. I've worked in "Information Security for a Top Fortune100 Company" for over 25 years and this type of electronic theft is easily preventable. Please do NOT buy electronic gift cards from Amazon until they tighten up their gift card process. BUYER BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Z

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Quick Gift Cards for folks who live out of town
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of family that lives in another state and when it is time for gift, I find it so much easier to choose an Amazon gift card. Why? First, I can choose how much I want to spend. Second, no matter what they want, Amazon is going to offer it, Third, it is quick and easy if I have forgotten to buy a gift and I don't have to drive anywhere. Fourth, I don't have to pay shipping charges. Fifth, there are a lot of great designs to choose from and finally, I have a record of my purchase. The cards are always welcomed by my family. Super easy! Super quick!
customer_reviews.author: Mesmereyes

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Process, Amazon really needs to improve this.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is supposed to have great technology, but the process for issuing these gift cards is terrible. We issue the same card with the same image and message to 10+ people every week, and yet every time we have to go through the whole process of choosing our image, choose the card type, amount, entering the message, etc. Why can't we just save a "template" and re-use that template each time? It would take a good web developer about a day to develop that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Do I want to do this again?
customer_reviews.text: Just think finding the card and having it sent instantly via email was a little confusing. Not obvious at first which item to click on. Also, after doing it - I was expecting a quick notice of some sort saying - "your item was sent" or some such thing. Didn't happen. Then I read of problems connected with gift cards being intercepted by hackers and was uncomfortable until 2 weeks later when I finally confirmed my card was received. Whew!
customer_reviews.author: Nikiwiki

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful what are you going to buy
customer_reviews.text: when purchased i did not know it could not be used for my Aunt to purchase her prime membership. she also could not activate the card because one of the symbols was unreadable. even the help line could not get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: ChefThyme

customer_reviews.title: Presentation on Amazon not APPEAR accurate read the fine print!
customer_reviews.text: unhappy with the presentation on Amazon website as it states if you purchase another card after you put one in which I did for $50 that you will get $5 for an additional 20 well if you're someone like me either doesn't always wear their glasses or has always relied on and it's always been happy with Amazon I did not enlarge the fine print and thought I was getting a $5 credit on Amazon which states when enlarged is only for new customers. Please read the fine printbecause for some reason or the other Amazon is going through some changes and there's always other carriers that offer the same products and very similar prices.
customer_reviews.author: Carlene Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Work as described however....
customer_reviews.text: I bought using a code for $15 extra per $50. Never saw the $15 for either of the 2 cards purchased. Instead, they gave me I think $7 for loading $100. I wouldn't know as I couldn't see anything as the amount was never in any way shown in my account balance. Strange and shady. If I would have known, I wouldn't have bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Rubber Biscuit

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Effective, and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to buy and giveaway! We got an eAmazon gift card for our Heal the Honeypot Winner. She got her gobevatd within minutes of me sending it without any problem. The best part is that I saved money by ordering the eCard verus the physical card. I did not have to stand in line for it or leave my home. Just a click here and I sent it out. It was just that easy and fun!
customer_reviews.author: HomeschoolingandOils

customer_reviews.title: Beware buying gift cards through 3rd party merchants!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy an Amazon Gift Card at Speedway Gas Stations. It's a nice incentive to get points for buying, but most of the time there are new employees working who don't know how to properly activate gift cards. I bought a 50.00 gift card, went home to activate and was told the card is not valid. I had wisely saved my receipts but still the pain process to straighten out with Amazon, cause Speedway just drops the ball after purchase saying they aren't responsible for issues. I managed to get Amazon to give me the 50.00 back but it was alot of time and emails to make my case.
customer_reviews.author: cd-heaven

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy Amazon eGift Card
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy an Amazon egift card. Their security is so poor that the balance gets redeemed before the intended recipient gets it! When the person you gifted the card to tries to redeem it the card shows $0.00 balance. Whoever BB Wells is, you are a low life thief, if that is even your real name. Don't spend it all in one place. Just remember, Karma is a bitch! Why would Amazon not monitor these to make sure it is redeemed by the intended recipient??
customer_reviews.author: Fredia Creech

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: If you are in a doubt - just email the card to yourself first. Once you have it, you can actually see it and then forward or copy/paste to the intended recipient. I did that and it was good to see the card with my own eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: Paid for this gift card ...no security....someone unauthorized processed it. No recourse....BE CAREFUL!
customer_reviews.author: Ali M

customer_reviews.title: can't pay to have reactivated but good news is they will not charge to for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 11 gift cards. Delivery date passed, and no cards. Several days pass, and no cards. Finally asked to be reissued and told no, can't reissue can only give me a credit to my account that can only be used to purchase from Amazon. Days later, guess what? They arrived. Called to ask they be reactivated and naturally I would pay for them again (had already used the credit on the account) Told no, can't pay to have reactivated but good news is they will not charge to for the cards a second time, cards that are no longer valid for use. Gee, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Hines Rallo

customer_reviews.title: Once you hit the send button - there is no customer service !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst customer service - ever !!! Thinking about cancelling my prime account - not that anyone would even notice or care. Buying one of these gift cards is like buying a watch from a stranger on the street. After the stranger walks away, the watch is yours - if if it is unusable ############3
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS! THERE IS. NOOOOO CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! NOW I HAVE BLOWN $50 and my FRIEND DID NOT RECEIVE HER GIFT!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two cards. Received two cards. Security at receipt end was marginal. Would not do an e-card again. Have had traceable results with box shipment cards and like that better.
customer_reviews.author: Luap

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE AMAZON GIFTCARDS
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a gift card for almost $700 to redeem for a large purchase and several other smaller items. I went in to redeem my gift card and the balance is now $0. Essentially, Amazon is informing me that gift cards are not secure and that they have no liability and are not required to refund the monies. My account has clearly been compromised and Amazon is aware of this and still refuses to do anything. I have contacted my bank to dispute the charge per the Amazon representative. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Fabulous Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Simple work around for the lack of multiple payment options
customer_reviews.text: I got a prepaid Visa card for completing a survey. Since Amazon doesn't let you specify multiple sources, I had to buy a gift card for myself. I wrote myself a very nice note, and it felt good to get a warm compliment from myself. It also seemed like I was funneling a very small amount of money, which added a little air of intrigue and danger.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: I was supposed to get a 15$ credit with this ...
customer_reviews.text: I was supposed to get a 15$ credit with this purchase but it never worked. The add said click here and the code would be added to my account but it never gave me the credit, 18PRIMEGC Don’t believe it.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Davis _

customer_reviews.title: Gift Card Never Arrived
customer_reviews.text: I bought an e-gift card to be delivered to my husband's email box on his birthday. It never arrived. I re-sent it twice... never arrived. I finally had to call Amazon, and they just added the amount to my husband's wallet. That really defeated the purpose of sending him an e-gift card in the first place, since I had to tell him to look at his account to see that there was now money there. The Amazon rep had no idea why my card wouldn't go through, and even though he made sure the money got to the right account, it was a disappointment from a gift-giving perspective.
customer_reviews.author: The Cat Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon card was bought with a visa gift card and used to make an Amazon purchase. A little tricky to negotiate your way to purchasing it especially since the person on the other end of the phone doesn't speak English well but she was patient and understanding of the communication challenge and at the end of it i was satisfied. All in all, the experience was a lovely one and I got to use my Amazon card right away. Incidentally there is a fee for the pleasure of this convience but for me it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Gift Cards
customer_reviews.text: Ive used Amazon Gift Cards online several times now. I've been pleased every time. The last two I purchased though were not delivered for maybe two days after they were purchased. Lucky for me I purchased them ahead of the dates needed, so they were actually not late. If you purchase Amazon Gift Cards online, be aware that they may take up to two days to be delivered, so purchase early. You can always specify a date in the future for their online delivery. Either way, they are the perfect gift for when you don't have a specific gift in mind and the giftee can make their own purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Mather

customer_reviews.title: I did not enjoy them!
customer_reviews.text: NO...I did not enjoy them!!! I TOLD YOU PEOPLE THAT ,I,DID NOT PURCHASE THESE CARDS.!!!! My account was hacked. You've seen what my purchase history is like. When have you ever known me to purchase iTune gift cards. Get a life!!!
customer_reviews.author: JACQUELINE SPEARS

customer_reviews.title: A lengthy process requiring customer support contact...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why, but this was a really difficult process. I tried to give someone with a Prime membership a Season of Dr. Who. Amazon told me the only way to do that was to send a gift card with the money amount on it. Although my friend was able to receive it eventually, it took several day, several contacts with Amazon Customer Service, and a lot of hastle for the person I was trying to give the gift to. I’m afraid I will have to be more cautious in the future. I have gifted Kindle books in the past with no trouble, but wierdly, giving a gift card seems to be a fraught process.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Very quick and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use especially as a last minute gift. I have purchased several of these and sent them as text messages. I believe the only downfall is that the only way to be sure it was sent is to ask the person you sent it to because it did not show up as a sent message in my phone, but I would recommend checking with whoever you send it to because a lot of people do not realize the message is a gift card. This is to me a great idea as well as a life saver for last minute gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Stabbin

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the address right
customer_reviews.text: The cards are great and I would give 5 stars BUT make sure you have the right email address or whatever firm of electronic address. Otherwise like me and a few other people here who fat-fingered an address got ripped off. Fortunately for me I did get compensated. A further note is that Amazon is merely the retail outlet for the cards, the banks own the responsibility to remediate the fraud not Amazon. And no I don't work for either of them ;)
customer_reviews.author: customer_advocate

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THESE CARDS
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was sent three $50 Amazon Gift Cards for her Birthday. Each card had been stripped of the money before it arrived. Talking with customer service I was asked "what do you want me to do". Great customer service Amazon. This is the fourth time an e gift card has arrived with the money gone. I sent one to a friend a few months ago, no money on it when it arrived. And Amazon Customer service was not interested. If I had known my friends were sending my daughter Amazon e gift cards, I would have warned them not to. WORST DEAL THEY HAVE. AND THEY DO NOT HELP WHEN YOU RIPPED OFF!
customer_reviews.author: Mairye

customer_reviews.title: Great tool in converting my Vanilla One debit/visa card!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to convert a Vanilla One debit/visa gift card for $100 that someone gave me to an Amazon gift card to myself. Be aware if you do that it can take up to 12 hours for a debit card to be "manually reviewed" by the fraud department despite the write up on Amazon that you can send an e-gift card in minutes. The conversion let me use the entire $100 rather than having a bit left over I'd never be able to use. All said I'd do it again--just with awareness about the possible 12 hour delay.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Carol

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Our niece was getting ready to have a baby, so we checked her registry for what she needed. After a couple of attempts to purchase from that registry, I gave up and wondered why I even bothered. I just went to amazon and sent her a gift card. I bought the card, copied the code, and gave it to her on messenger. Quick, easy, and she was quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Wheels

customer_reviews.title: Great Amazon feature. However...
customer_reviews.text: I was a victim of an internet scam (my fault). They wanted me to verify my "contest" winnings via an AZ gift card. I was stupid to believe this, after the fact. I just wish AZ would have some type of security and protection of this misbehavior. It's running rampant now, so take my story in mind if someone wants $omething from you to get $omething back. AZ is absolutely not at fault for my stupidity...i was just an ignorant, desperate fool!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie See

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to order and well loved by recipients
customer_reviews.text: If your recipient shops on amazon they will love receiving an amazon egift card. My cards got there early on the day I requested they be sent. I wish I knew or could organize the time of receipt but the recipients opened them in the early AM so I assume they were sent after midnight or at least before 6am in the day of. Loved the choice of card and that you could pick animated. Recommend. Easy experience for me.
customer_reviews.author: CC✨👩🏻‍🍳✨

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. I would have never signed up for it ...
customer_reviews.text: Never received it or can’t seem to find it. Signed up for Amazon visa for it and spent a certain amount and haven’t received it yet! Disappointed. I would have never signed up for it because prefer to use my American Express due to airline rewards and automatic payment through bank. I have to remember to physically write a check and mail it if using Amazon card which is a hassle and I’m not likely to do unless I get my giftcard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would have been nice to get an email telling me this
customer_reviews.text: I have used eGift Cards before with no problem. This one didn't work. I got an email that it had been sent. Recipient never got it. I never got an email to say there was a problem. On the plus side - I was not charged for it. When I called I was told there was a security problem with my account. Would have been nice to get an email telling me this. They fixed it and I was able to resend the gift several weeks later. I was never told what the problem was.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: e-gift card from hell
customer_reviews.text: I gave a friend a e-gift card and the code she got said it was used
customer_reviews.author: Elton

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: I bought a gift card for my grandson. He received it and is unable to use it. I have emailed Amazon and I have waited patiently since everyone is dealing with the virus now but really how long would it take them to fix the issue or refund the amount of the gift card to my amazon account. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: for a nickel more you can get one in yellow
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect size and color. it fit my application perfectly. shipping was fast and courteous. I didn't have to fold it in half to fit it through the door. Even the cat liked it (and she doesn't like anything) low odor and flavorless. it was almost silent and doesn't wake the neighbors works even at night or in the rain batteries were not included (not required) cables sold separately (its wireless) I felt 10 years younger and 2 inches taller stays crispy in milk folds flat for easy storage cleanup is a breeze What else can I say? I got it and emailed it as a gift. the recipient had it in 2 minutes. no muss, no fuss
customer_reviews.author: david zuber

customer_reviews.title: Great fun to have your own personal photo on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fun to have your own personal photo on the gift e card! My son loves our pup, misses him now that he is grown and left home
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Quick/Easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought a $25 gift card for Prime Day and got $5 free. Great, easy way to score some free $ while shopping for things I needed anyway. The email containing the gift card took 5 minutes or so to deliver. If you are concerned with it not going to your intended target, I suggest putting your own email in the delivery field and then forwarding the code/card to your recipient so you can guarantee it gets where you need it to be.
customer_reviews.author: A. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and frightening
customer_reviews.text: It's our favorite thing now. We like to throw it around, we briefly worshiped it as an idol, but sometimes it just sits in an honored place and makes us feel better than people who don't have one. We haven't been able to determine an actual use for it. Bookmark, maybe? If only we had a place to purchase books and the resources to buy them, this would be optimal.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Laurence Hudson
